name: Shals - The Shadow Of The Light Seekers
name_original: Shals - The Shadow Of The Light Seekers
description:
How far is it possible to go ignoring your dark side?

SHALS (The Shadow Of The Light Seekers) is a Runner for 2 player, where one player controls the main character and the other control his shadow. Both on the same device!

The main character is a girl who is seeking spiritual elevation, but has been ignoring her dark side in this process. In the final product, she and her shadow will run through scenarios that represent the seasons, alluding to the years that we all go through obstacles without facing and welcoming our dark side.

Grab a friend give it a try!

Feedbacks are welcome!
